author: ssekmen
body:
Backport of the new FastSim geometry/particle propagator and later corrections to 94X:
- PR #20666 : New fastsim geometry reb
- PR #22311 : Fix after urgent message from validation campaign 
- PR #22459 : Fix for observed muon efficiency loss in new FastSim geometry 
- PR #23174 : fixes in assignment of SimTracks/SimVertices
Also added:
- PR #21268 : Include PSet which is referenced via refToPSet_
- PR #24210 : Fixed memory leak in TrackerSimHitProducer
title: New fastsim geometry - backport to 94X
